findings.rationale: A five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of confidential information, especially in rapidly evolving industries.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The reliance on injunctive relief without monetary damages may leave the Disclosing Party vulnerable if a breach occurs.
findings.evidence_quote: The parties acknowledge that monetary damages may be inadequate for breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Prohibiting assignment without consent may limit flexibility in business transactions and complicate future partnerships.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
